Package scrabble.model

package scrabble.model
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Board
    This class represents the scrabble board.
    Game
    This class represents the Scrabble game.
    LocalPlayer
    This class represents the player who is on this computer
    NetworkPlayer
    This class represents a player over a network.
    Player
    Generalized representation of a Player in the Scrabble game.
    Ruleset
    This class is a representation of the options in a Scrabble game.
    Tile
    This class represents the tiles of the Scrabble game.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    ModifierType
    Enumeration of the modifier types on the Scrabble board
    TileScore
    An enumeration of the values of the tiles in Scrabble.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    NotBlankException
    Exception for trying to set a tile to have a letter value when it is not blank
